metadata.dc:author: Salazar, Sonia
Martínez, Henry
Monge, Eduardo
Espinoza, Miguel
Tapia, Abel
Huaman, César
metadata.dc:description: This is a case report of a 19 year-old woman, with an acute recurrent pancreatitis diagnose, and pancreas divisum as anatomic alteration. An extensive evaluation including specialized labs, ERCP was done. The diagnosis is suspected during ERCP and confirmed by minor papilla injection. Treatment is directed towards relieving outflow obstruction at the level of the minor papilla, with successful results.
metadata.dc:title: Páncreas divisum: Manejo endoscópico. Reporte de un caso.
[Pancreas divisum: endoscopic management. Case report].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista de gastroenterologia del Peru : organo oficial de la Sociedad de Gastroenterologia del Peru
